title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:

Celebrate the warmth and joy of the holiday season with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. These beautiful napkins are the perfect addition to your festive table, bringing the Christmas spirit to every meal. 

Crafted from a soft polyester material, these napkins boast a smooth and glossy finish that feels luxurious to the touch. Adorned with a serene Nativity scene in a calming blue hue, each napkin is further embellished with gold embroidered texts that reflect the true meaning of Christmas.

The set includes 12 napkins, each measuring 17 x 17 inches, providing ample coverage for laps and tables. These napkins are not only elegant but also practical. They are washable and reusable, ensuring that they can be a part of your holiday celebrations for years to come.

The embroidered sayings - 'Joy', 'Love', 'Blessed', 'Merry', 'Believe', 'Peace' - add a touch of inspiration to your gatherings. Whether it's a Christmas dinner, a religious event, or just a festive get-together, these napkins serve as a gentle reminder of the season's blessings.

Presented in a set of 12, these napkins make a thoughtful gift for family, friends, or fellow believers. They come neatly packaged and ready to be gifted or used at your next Christmas event.

Please note that slight size errors may occur due to manual measurement, and there may be a slight difference in color due to screen display variations. Rest assured, the words embroidered on these napkins are not used as a trademark but are meant to express the joyous sentiments of the season.

Bring home the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins and infuse your celebrations with elegance, devotion, and the spirit of Christmas.

Don't fuss about spills and stains! These napkins are made from high-quality polyester, ensuring they are both washable and reusable. You can keep them looking pristine for many Christmases to come, making them as practical as they are beautiful.

Measuring a generous 17 x 17 inches, they are just the right size for laps or lining breadbaskets. And, as thoughtful as they are handy, these napkins make a wonderful gift for family, friends, or fellow church members.
